<p>


I'm a third year Biostatistics PhD Student at Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health. I completed my B.A. in Mathematics at the [University of Pennsylvania](https://www.upenn.edu/) in 2015. I previously worked as a data analyst at the [Brain and Behavioral Lab](http://www.med.upenn.edu/bbl/). I'm interested in brain imaging statistics and the analysis of high dimensional data.
